alert.note: Alert for Beauregard (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 10:10AM CST until January 27 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bundick Creek At Bundick Lake Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bundick Creek At Bundick Lake. * WHEN...From this morning to Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 98.0 feet, Minor flooding begins around the south end of the lake. Some of the lowest structures on the north end of the lake begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 97.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 97.6 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 97.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Bundick Creek Bundick Lake 97.0 97.0 Wed 9 am CST 97.6 97.0 96.4 &&
